abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibition When the Curtain Never Comes Down: Performance Art and the Alter Ego at American Folk Art Museum.
lead_paragraph: “When the Curtain Never Comes Down,” at the American Folk Art Museum, art is fresh, innovative and view-altering.

headline.main: Review: A Strange and Wonderful View of Outsider Art

snippet: “When the Curtain Never Comes Down,” at the American Folk Art Museum, art is fresh, innovative and view-altering.
